llm_outputs.rationale: The table provides a 'Minimum Living Area per Dwelling (SF)' value of 750 sq ft for the C-1 Commercial Mixed Use district. However, this is footnoted with [3], which states 'Minimum living area per dwelling (sf) does not apply to any structure subject to regulation under the NC Residential Code for one and two-family dwellings'. Therefore, this may not be applicable as a true minimum unit size requirement.
